message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your product, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you consider this price?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product. Could you meet me halfway at $17,500?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm still looking to keep my budget within $10,000 if possible. Would you be open to discussing a price closer to $15,000?
